realm.name: iotp_admin
realm.description: IOTP administrator user. Can create/manage all user artifacts.

realm.name: iotp_user
realm.description: Standard IOTP user. Can create/view only artifacts

policies.name: Default Policy
policies.description: A policy that grants access only for users within this realm

config.code:
// by default, grants any permission associated with this policy
$evaluation.grant();

policies.name: Default Permission
policies.description: A permission that applies to the default resource type

authenticationFlows.description: Handle what to do if there is existing account with same email/username like authenticated identity provider
Actions taken after first broker login with identity provider account, which is not yet linked to any Keycloak account
Username, password, otp and other auth forms.
Reset credentials for a user if they forgot their password or something
